sentence.Network_cn: 对如此伟业,所有的初步组织工作,均属正规.

entry.def: Organizational abilities and methods relate to the way that work, activities, or events are planned and arranged.

example.ex: Evelyn's excellent organisational skills were soon spotted by her employers...
example.tran: 伊夫琳出色的组织能力很快就被老板发现。

example.ex: Because we took the whole class for a complete afternoon session, organisational problems were minimal.
example.tran: 我们带着全班上了整整一个下午的课，所以课堂安排上基本没什么问题。

entry.def: Organizational means relating to the structure of an organization.

example.ex: The police now recognise that big organisational changes are needed.
example.tran: 警方现在意识到需要进行大幅度的机构调整。

example.ex: ...the organizational structure of British trade unions.

entry.def: Organizational means relating to organizations, rather than individuals.

example.ex: This problem needs to be dealt with at an organizational level...
example.tran: 这个问题需要在机构层面上解决。

example.ex: There was no strong organizational base on which to build.
example.tran: 缺乏一个坚实的组织基础。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to an organization;

auth_sentence.content: The concept of the flat organizational structure is hardly new.
auth_sentence.res_content: The concept of the flat organizational structure is hardly new.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The concept of the flat organizational structure is hardly new.

auth_sentence.content: The campaign follows a series of management and organizational changes Gap made this year.
auth_sentence.res_content: The campaign follows a series of management and organizational changes Gap made this year.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The campaign follows a series of management and organizational changes Gap made this year.

auth_sentence.content: Jiang has hit and presumably disabled Falungong's highly disciplined, if amorphous, organizational structure.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jiang has hit and presumably disabled Falungong's highly disciplined, if amorphous, organizational structure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jiang has hit and presumably disabled Falungong's highly disciplined, if amorphous, organizational structure.

Sentence.sentence: My idea would be to combine that with careful oversight, a strong organizational culture, and make sure the goals that you use are going to be constructive and not significantly harm the organization," Schweitzer says.
